text: 5.2: 1 Ko 15.1; Ef 2.18; 3.12; Hi 3.6; 10.19Nza guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, ana nza nzuav tuav fhɨrgim, nza ntigem Fhe Bakɨme fhura nza kora mbui kora muumbar, nza anan vhen ki. Nza kav, Fhe Bakɨmen rargi, anan nza ndigirim, nza tuituigip ana han Hevenan piigiv kɨrga. Nza ne nzuav ndikndigap ki.
